Full Review:
Overall the AC is a good buy. I am using it in the costal region where the humidity is pretty high. The AC works like a charm. However it has 2 main cons

1. There is no button in the remote to switch off the AC display light.
2. The app that comes with the AC cannot set the off/sleep timer to automatically switch off the AC. This feature works only with the remote.

Overall the the con is you need both the app and the remote to operate the AC at full efficiency.

Overall the AC is a good buy. I am using it in the costal region where the humidity is pretty high. The AC works like a charm. However it has 2 main cons

1. There is no button in the remote to switch off the AC display light.
2. The app that comes with the AC cannot set the off/sleep timer to automatically switch off the AC. This feature works only with the remote.

Overall the the con is you need both the app and the remote to operate the AC at full efficiency.

Considering the price it a good deal. :)

It does leak water when the soleplate is not hot enough but as called out in the description it is not a defect. It stops if you keep it standing on its back.

Full Review:

Review Summary: Superb Product, Accurate and cheapest. GO FOR IT
Full Review:
This Philips Steam iron is a gem of a product. Have been using this for 2 weeks now.

- The iron is very light and handy to use
- The steam output is also great and presses clothes to wonder even linen clothes too in one shot flat
- Heats within 40 secs and ready to use

I would suggest this product to all of you guys if you are looking for a value for money steam iron, go fo it

Review Summary: Not up to the mark as per the review ratings
Full Review:
I got the product the next day which is possible with Flipkart and Flipkart is using this feature as an advantage to impress customer. Nevertheless, that is good but this product when I unpacked I felt the product quality is moderate and substandard.

Need to observe for few days to see whether it is functioning properly or not.

This iron is very good. It heats up quickly and glides on your clothes. The water tank has good capacity and even the steam is very steady. It weighs good but not too heavy like the granny style irons and is easy to handle.
I found it cheaper on flipkart so in fact cancelled the order placed with other online website a day before buying it here.
Timely delivery Nice packing good item with ease handling. Good design light weight. Reasonable price
